values: To limp means to walk with difficulty because someone’s leg or foot is hurt.
After the injury, the player limped off of the field.
v. 瘸着脚走，跛行；进展缓慢，艰难地行进 adj. 柔软的，不直挺的；无力的，无精神的 n. 跛行
